column4: is it possible for your hd to completely stop working from installing operating systems too many times?
: theoretically, yes, but you'd havta install quite a few

can u give me an example number b/c i have installed windows ALOT!!! on this one hd due to viruses and stuff then i installed linux 2 times and now i turned it on the other day and it couldn't find certain sectors
it is installed on a win98
a windows boot floppy will clean the mbr
so does it have to be a 98 boot floppy?
and if so where can i get one?
use your win98 to make one
put fdisk.com on it when it's made
that is the fdisk.com in your c:/windows/ directory
make a boot disk, and find your fdisk.com you have in c:/windows/command and copy that onto it
boot with the floppy, and type "fdisk /mbr", and that'll do it
how do i know which version of 98 i have? i know i don't have se but i have custom and OEM to choose from
